text: Well, I see a kitchen and a housewife or homemaker at the sink and her two kids are having a great time. She is drying a dish as her sink overflows. She must be blind, but that's her doing. So the kid is about to fall, having successfully gotten a cookie out of the cookie jar. That's the boy who's up on a stool and the daughter is there trying to grab the cookie I guess from the boy. What else? It looks like a nice yard in back with a bit of a garden and some grass. I believe she's standing in the water. It still bothers me that she's gone blind, that she can't, she'll feel it soon on her feet when the water hits her. That's what I see.
